title: Elon Musk's xAI to bring AI to public schools in El Salvador
description: El Salvador President Nayib Bukele said Thursday that his administration is partnering with Elon Musk’s artificial intelligence company xAI to bring artificial intelligence into more than 5,000 public schools.
content:
SAN SALVADOR, El Salvador — El Salvador President Nayib Bukele said Thursday that his administration is partnering with Elon Musk’s artificial intelligence company xAI to bring artificial intelligence into more than 5,000 public schools.

title: Wall Street is close to setting record highs, even as Oracle tumbles on AI worries
description: Wall Street is rising toward records, even as a sell-off for Oracle and worries about a potential bubble in artificial-intelligence technology weigh on the market
content:
NEW YORK (AP) — Wall Street is rising toward records on Thursday, even as a sell-off for Oracle and worries about a potential bubble in artificial-intelligence technology weigh on the market.
The S&P 500 inched up 0.2% and was on track to eke past it... [5296 chars]

title: Rivian unveils AI chip for automated driving, ditches Nvidia
description: Rivian Automotive Inc. has developed its own artificial intelligence chip, replacing Nvidia Corp. technology as part of a broader push to add and enhance automated-driving features in future vehicles.
content:
(Bloomberg/Ed Ludlow) — Rivian Automotive Inc. has developed its own artificial intelligence chip, replacing Nvidia Corp. technology as part of a broader push to add and enhance automated-driving features in future vehicles.
